insert into draw_branner ( brannerUrl, clickUrl, type, sort, drawId, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime ) values (#{brannerUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drawId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update draw_branner set brannerUrl = #{brannerurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clickUrl = #{clickurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, drawId = #{drawid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opName = #{opname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opId = #{opid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update draw_branner
brannerUrl = #{brannerurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clickUrl = #{clickUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
drawId = #{drawId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
opName = #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
opId = #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifyTime = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, brannerUrl, clickUrl, type, sort, drawId, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime from draw_branner where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, brannerUrl, clickUrl, type, sort, drawId, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime from draw_branner order by sort asc
